title: CIMCON Digital’s iEdge 360 Platform
description: CIMCON Digital’s iEdge 360 Platform is a complete system that includes an edge management platform to complete the chain with sensor-to-cloud (or on-premises data network) integration under a single umbrella.

title: CIMCON Digital’s iEdge 360 Platform for Smart Manufacturing
description: CIMCON Digital’s iEdge 360 Platform is critical to unlock benefits from IoT, AI, & ML technologies to deliver better manufacturing outcomes.

title: CIM 10
description: The CIM10 is an intelligent edge device that runs advanced AI-based anomaly detection and diagnostic algorithms to predict and report on various faults such as misalignment, imbalance, structural and rotating looseness, soft foot, and more.
